name: unchewable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
difficult or impossible to chew (= bite or crush with your teeth): They remove the protective shells from nuts and seeds which would otherwise be unchewable. The crusts of the loaf were dry and unchewable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe meat was dry, overcooked, and almost completely unchewable.The boiled millet given to them is so hard as to be virtually unchewable.Although the horse's harness is tough, it's not completely unchewable and so may need to be replaced after some time.
